Class ResourceRequest

java.lang.Object
ResourceRequest
public class ResourceRequest extends Object
Represents an ongoing request from a client (only used on the request processing/receiver node)

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    (package private) static ArrayList<ResourceRequest>
    all
    All resource requests ever sent from this node
    (package private) ArrayList<String>
    failedNodes
    Contains a list of nodes that do not have any of the requested resources (filled on the first scan)
    static int
    lastOrderID
    Global incrementer that ensures each order on this node has an unique ID (IDs outside of a node are used in conjunction with the address of the node that handles a particular request, so there is no possibility for IDs to be non unique)
    (package private) HashMap<String,HashMap<String,Integer>>
    locked
    Key = node address Value = map of key: locked type, val: locked amount
    (package private) HashMap<String,Integer>
    order
    Contains the original composition of this request
    int
    orderId
    An identifier of this particular order, retrieved from the global identifier.
    String
    originator
    The name of the client that created (sent) this request
    (package private) ClientHandler
    originatorHandler
    A TCP server handler that contains the socket necessary for communication with the client
    (package private) HashMap<String,Integer>
    remaining
    Contains the parts of the request that are yet to be locked
    RequestStatus
    status
    Diagnostic information regarding the current status of this request.

  • Field Details

    • all

      static ArrayList<ResourceRequest> all
      All resource requests ever sent from this node

    • lastOrderID

      public static int lastOrderID
      Global incrementer that ensures each order on this node has an unique ID (IDs outside of a node are used in conjunction with the address of the node that handles a particular request, so there is no possibility for IDs to be non unique)

    • orderId

      public int orderId
      An identifier of this particular order, retrieved from the global identifier.

    • originator

      public String originator
      The name of the client that created (sent) this request

    • originatorHandler

      ClientHandler originatorHandler
      A TCP server handler that contains the socket necessary for communication with the client

    • order

      HashMap<String,Integer> order
      Contains the original composition of this request

    • remaining

      HashMap<String,Integer> remaining
      Contains the parts of the request that are yet to be locked

    • failedNodes

      ArrayList<String> failedNodes
      Contains a list of nodes that do not have any of the requested resources (filled on the first scan)

    • locked

      HashMap<String,HashMap<String,Integer>> locked
      Key = node address Value = map of key: locked type, val: locked amount

    • status

      public RequestStatus status
      Diagnostic information regarding the current status of this request.

  • Constructor Details

    • ResourceRequest

      public ResourceRequest(String originator, ClientHandler originatorHandler, HashMap<String,Integer> order)
      Puts in a request with this node for specific resources
      Parameters:
      originator - request originator node address
      originatorHandler - handler for the connection of the client associated with this request
      order - hash map Key: ResourceID Value: ResourceAmount of the requested resources

    • ResourceRequest

      public ResourceRequest(String originator, ClientHandler originatorHandler, String... orderStrings)
      Puts in a request with this node for specific resources
      Parameters:
      originator - request originator node address
      originatorHandler - handler for the connection of the client associated with this request
      orderStrings - formatted resource string representing the resources (ResourceID:ResourceAmount)

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      public static ArrayList<ResourceRequest> getAll()
      Returns:
      all requests ever made from this node.

    • getClientHandler

      public ClientHandler getClientHandler()
      Can be used to contact with the client that made this order (e.g. to tell them it's failed or succeeded)
      Returns:
      a client handler that can send data to them and holds an open TCP socket

    • getFailedNodes

      public ArrayList<String> getFailedNodes()
      This is helpful when determining what nodes should not be asked for resources they do not have. Only contains useful info after a first network scan.
      Returns:
      node addresses of nodes that failed to lock any of the requested resources

    • getIdentifier

      public String getIdentifier()
      Makes and gives a unique identifier for a particular request.
      Returns:
      an identifier of this request (client name:order id)

    • getLocked

      public HashMap<String,HashMap<String,Integer>> getLocked()
      Return a map representing various nodes that locked resources for this request.
      Returns:
      HashMap where the key is a node address and the value is a map where the key is a resource type (name) and the value is the amount locked on a particular node

    • getOrderRemaining

      public HashMap<String,Integer> getOrderRemaining()
      Tells what more resources need to be locked for this request
      Returns:
      a HashMap where the key is a resource name and the value is the amount.

    • isFullyLocked

      public boolean isFullyLocked()
      Method that checks if this request has locked all resources that it required.
      Returns:
      true if all requested resources are locked

    • getOrder

      public HashMap<String,Integer> getOrder()
      Method that returns the original composition of this request
      Returns:
      Hash Map where the key is a resource type (name) and the value is the count

    • addLockedResource

      public void addLockedResource(String nodeAddress, String resourceType, int resourceAmount)
      Logs that a resource has been locked on a node.
      Parameters:
      nodeAddress - The address of the node that has this resource locked
      resourceType - The type (name) of the resource that this request locked
      resourceAmount - The amount that this request has locked on that node

    • sendToAllLockedNodes

      private void sendToAllLockedNodes(UDPServer server, String command)
      Internal method that sends a COMMAND RES1:RESVAL1 RES2:RESVAL2 ... command to all nodes that have resources that this request has locked.
      Parameters:
      server - The UDP Server that will send the messages
      command - The command to be sent (usually ULK or RES)

    • release

      public void release(UDPServer server)
      Releases all held locks (Unlocks) across all nodes that have them locked.
      Parameters:
      server - The UDP Server that will send the messages.

    • finalizeOrder

      public void finalizeOrder(UDPServer server)
      Requests to reserve all held locks acrosss all nodes that have them locked.
      Parameters:
      server - The UDP Server that will send the messages.
